A Continuation of morning-exercise questions and cases of conscience practicaly resolved by sundry ministers in October, 1682. Annesley, Samuel, 1620?-1696.
873 p. in various pagings.
Printed by J.A. for John Dunton, London : 1683.
A collection of sermons by several authors compiled by Samuel Annesley. "To the reader" signed: Samuel Annesley. Paging irregular. Pages 630-663, 913-1010 from the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library copy spliced at end. Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
=======
